name: Medida
description: A traditional warm Sudanese porridge drink.
directions: In a separate bowl, mix the flour and water until smooth and well combined.
Pour the flour-water mixture into a pot, add milk, and stir until fully incorporated.
Heat the mixture over high heat, stirring occasionally, until it reaches a gentle boil.
Reduce heat slightly, then add Greek yogurt and stir until fully combined.
Add sugar to taste and mix well until dissolved.
Pour into a mug or bowl and serve hot. Enjoy!
